block.p: Bonnie Orenstein and Lee Feinberg were married on Thursday evening at the Hotel Plaza Athenee in New York. Rabbi Barry Friedman performed the ceremony.

Mr. and Mrs. Feinberg work at PaineWebber, the securities brokerage firm, for which the bride is the director of its advertising department in Weehawken, N.J., and the bridegroom is the director of stock sales and marketing for the private-client group in New York.
Bonnie Orenstein and Lee Feinberg were married on Thursday evening at the Hotel Plaza Athenee in New York. Rabbi Barry Friedman performed the ceremony.

Mr. and Mrs. Feinberg work at PaineWebber, the securities brokerage firm, for which the bride is the director of its advertising department in Weehawken, N.J., and the bridegroom is the director of stock sales and marketing for the private-client group in New York.

The bride graduated from Syracuse University. She is a daughter of Vita and Lawrence Orenstein of South Orange, N.J. Her father retired as a vice president of the Allied Beverage Group, a family-owned wine and spirits distributor in Carlstadt, N.J.
The bridegroom graduated from Drexel University. He is the son of Ida Feinberg of Ventnor, N.J., and the late Sam Feinberg. His parents owned a tailor shop that was in Haddonfield, N.J.
